description.value:
Level 4 Evocation

Casting Time: 1 action

Range: 300 feet

Components: V, S, M (a mitten)

Duration: Instantaneous

Hail falls in a 20-foot-radius, 40-foot-high Cylinder [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cylinder centered on a point within range. Each creature in the Cylinder [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cylinder makes a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 2d10 Bludgeoning damage and 4d6 Cold damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. Hailstones turn ground in the Cylinder [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cylinder into Difficult Terrain|XPHB until the end of your next turn.

At Higher Levels: The Bludgeoning damage increases by 2d8|4-9|1d10 for each spell slot level above 4.
